title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, async calls, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Official VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-chat-mac
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI chat client for Ollama with keyboard shortcuts, markdown, and model picker.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation that builds Ollama from source with CUDA and ROCm variant flags.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-cli-utils
summary: Bash scripts to bulk pull, tag, convert, and benchmark GGUF models with Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community-maintained index of unofficial SDKs (Go, C#, Ruby, PHP, Dart, Elixir).

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Crowd-sourced registry of GGUF models tested with Ollama including Modelfile snippets.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tips, custom Modelfiles, benchmarks, and feature requests.

title: ollama-hackernews-launch
summary: Hacker News launch discussion comparing Ollama to llama.cpp, text-generation-webui, and LocalAI.
